content: May 2 (OPTA) - Scoreboard at close of play on the first day of match 44 between Gujarat Titans and Delhi Capitals on Tuesday at Ahmedabad, India Delhi Capitals win by 5 runs Delhi Capitals 1st innings Phil Salt c David Miller b Mohammed Shami 0 David Warner Run Out Rashid Khan 2 Priyam Garg c Wriddhiman Saha b Mohammed Shami 10 Rilee Rossouw c Wriddhiman Saha b Mohammed Shami 8 Manish Pandey c Wriddhiman Saha b Mohammed Shami 1 Axar Patel c Rashid Khan b Mohit Sharma 27 Aman Hakim Khan c Abhinav Manohar b Rashid Khan 51 Ripal Patel c Hardik Pandya b Mohit Sharma 23 Anrich Nortje Not Out 3 Kuldeep Yadav Not Out 0 Extras 0b 1lb 1nb 0pen 3w 5 Total (20.0 overs) 130-8 Fall of Wickets : 1-0 Salt, 2-6 Warner, 3-16 Rossouw, 4-22 Pandey, 5-23 Garg, 6-73 Patel, 7-126 Khan, 8-130 Patel Did Not Bat : Sharma Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Mohammed Shami 4 0 11 4 2.75 Hardik Pandya 1 0 10 0 10.00 1nb Joshua Little 3 0 27 0 9.00 Rashid Khan 4 0 28 1 7.00 1w Noor Ahmad 4 0 20 0 5.00 2w Mohit Sharma 4 0 33 2 8.25 .........................................................
